short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rissole lets you download receipts from your supermarket's website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Rissole is a simple and free extension that lets you download your Woolworths receipts as CSVs.

You could use it to track your itemised spending, or split your expenses with others.

How it works
When enabled, the extension watches the Everyday Rewards site. When you open a receipt on the site in the My Activity page, it detects the receipt and makes it available for you to download via a CSV.


Data security
This extension runs only on the Everyday Rewards website and does not interact with any external servers at all. Your data is not transmitted anywhere - it stays completely in your browser.


Woolworths non-affiliation
This is not an official Woolworths extension or affiliated with Woolworths in any way.
